name: vue-skills
description: A collection of skills for Vue.js development.

plugins.name: create-adaptable-composable
plugins.description: Create a library-grade Vue composable that accepts maybe-reactive inputs (MaybeRef / MaybeRefOrGetter) so callers can pass a plain value, ref, or getter. Normalize inputs with toValue()/toRef() inside reactive effects (watch/watchEffect) to keep behavior predictable and reactive. Use this skill when user asks for creating adaptable or reusable composables.

plugins.name: vue-best-practices
plugins.description: A collection of best practices and tips for developing applications using Vue.js. MUST be used when developing, refactoring, or reviewing Vue.js and Nuxt tasks.

plugins.name: vue-jsx-best-practices
plugins.description: JSX syntax in Vue (e.g., class vs className, JSX plugin config).

plugins.name: vue-options-api-best-practices
plugins.description: Vue 3 Options API style (data(), methods, this context). Each reference shows Options API solution only.

plugins.name: vue-pinia-best-practices
plugins.description: Pinia stores, state management patterns, store setup, and reactivity with stores.

plugins.name: vue-router-best-practices
plugins.description: Vue Router 4 patterns, navigation guards, route params, and route-component lifecycle interactions.

plugins.name: vue-testing-best-practices
plugins.description: Use for Vue.js testing. Covers Vitest, Vue Test Utils, component testing, mocking, testing patterns, and Playwright for E2E testing.
